篻字的基本解释

篻
piǎo
一种竹子，竹杆坚硬厚实，可做矛。亦称“筋竹”。
竹笋。
竹门。

篻
biāo
竹子生长的样子。

篻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piǎo］
［《廣韻》敷沼切，上小，滂。］
［《廣韻》彌遥切，平宵，明。］
竹名。即筋竹。

篻字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篻； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页896第17
【廣韻】【集韻】?彌遙切，音蜱。竹名。【玉篇】竹門也。【集韻】細竹。【筍譜】篻竹，實中，?屬，出韶州。莖五六寸，中爲弩矢。【左思·吳都賦】篻簩有叢。　又【集韻】?遙切，音猋。【廣韻】敷沼切【集韻】匹沼切，?音縹。義?同。　又匹妙切，音票。竹名。出九眞。【異物志】篻竹，大如戟槿，實中勁强，交阯人銳之爲矛，甚利。

篻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
篻字的起名意思

暂无。

篻
Basic explanation of words
篻
piǎo
A kind of bamboo with hard and thick poles that can be used as spears. Also known as "tendon bamboo".
Bamboo shoots.
Bamboo door.
篻
biāo
The way bamboo grows.
篻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［piǎo］
["Guangyun" is applied to the marsh and cuts, the upper small, the peng. ]
["Guangyun" Miyao cut, Pingxiao, Ming. ]
Bamboo name. That is tendon bamboo.
篻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　篻; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 896 17
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Mi Yao cut, sound tick. Bamboo name. [Jade articles] Zhumen also. [Ji Yun] thin bamboo. [Bamboo shoots] Bamboo, in the real, genus, out of Shaozhou. The stem is five or six inches, with a crossbow arrow in the middle. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] There are clusters on the 篻簩簩.　 [Ji Yun] again? Remote cut, sound 猋. [Guang Yun] Shizhao cut [Ji Yun] Horse cut,? Sound is misty. Righteous? Same.　Miao cut again, note. Bamboo name. Out of nine. [Foreign Object History] The bamboo is as big as a hibiscus, and it is strong in reality. It is sharp as a spear, very useful.
篻
